title: 'Best friend' says killer fiance asked mistress to KILL Colorado mom Kelsey Berreth
itunes:title: 'Best friend' says killer fiance asked mistress to KILL Colorado mom Kelsey Berreth
description:
An Idaho nurse told a friend that Patrick Frazee asked her to help kill Kelsey Berreth, his fiance' and mother of his child, according to a lawyer. It's the latest revelation in the investigation of Berreth's Thanksgiving Day disappearance from Woodland Park, Colorado. Nancy Grace takes another look at the case with experts including psychologist & lawyer Dr. Brian Russell, former detective Steven Lampley, family & divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, RadarOnline's Alexis Tereszcuk, and reporter Ellen Killoran.  Grace also looks at the case of an 8th-grade teacher in Texas charged with plotting to sell a girl as a sex slave. She's joined by psycho analyst Dr Bethany Marshall, forensics expert Karen Smith,  prosecutor Kenya Johnson, and Crime Stories' Alan Duke.
